df-ef
blocks.content: Define the exponential function. Its value at the complex number ` A ` is ` ( exp `` A ) ` and is called the "exponential of ` A ` "; see ~ efval . (Contributed by NM, 14-Mar-2005.)

blocks.name: df-e
blocks.content: Define Euler's constant ` _e ` = 2.71828.... (Contributed by NM, 14-Mar-2005.)

blocks.name: df-sin
blocks.content: Define the sine function. (Contributed by NM, 14-Mar-2005.)

blocks.name: df-cos
blocks.content: Define the cosine function. (Contributed by NM, 14-Mar-2005.)

blocks.name: df-tan
blocks.content: Define the tangent function. We define it this way for ~ cmpt , which requires the form ` ( x e. A |-> B ) ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Mar-2014.)

blocks.name: df-pi
blocks.content: Define the constant pi, ` _pi ` = 3.14159..., which is the smallest positive number whose sine is zero. Definition of ` _pi ` in [Gleason] p. 311. (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 23-Jan-2008.) (Revised by AV, 14-Sep-2020.)

blocks.name: eftcl
blocks.content: Closure of a term in the series expansion of the exponential function. (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 11-Sep-2007.)

blocks.name: reeftcl
blocks.content: The terms of the series expansion of the exponential function at a real number are real. (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 15-Jan-2008.)

blocks.name: eftabs
blocks.content: The absolute value of a term in the series expansion of the exponential function. (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 23-Nov-2007.)
blocks.origin:
thm eftabs(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cn0)), wceq(cfv(cabs, co(co(c0, cexp, c1), cdiv, cfv(cfa, c1))), co(co(cfv(cabs, c0), cexp, c1), cdiv, cfv(cfa, c1))))
} = {
  eqtrd(cfv(cabs, co(co(c0, cexp, c1), cdiv, cfv(cfa, c1))), co(co(cfv(cabs, c0), cexp, c1), cdiv, cfv(cfa, c1)), co(cfv(cabs, co(c0, cexp, c1)), cdiv, cfv(cabs, cfv(cfa, c1))), wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cn0)))
  absdivd(co(c0, cexp, c1), cfv(cfa, c1), wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cn0)))
  expcl(c0, c1)
  nncnd(cfv(cfa, c1), wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cn0)))
  adantl(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cn0), wne(cfv(cfa, c1), nat0))
  facne0(c1)
  oveq12d(cfv(cabs, co(c0, cexp, c1)), cdiv, cfv(cabs, cfv(cfa, c1)), co(cfv(cabs, c0), cexp, c1), cfv(cfa, c1), wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cn0)))
  absexp(c0, c1)
  absidd(cfv(cfa, c1), wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cn0)))
  nnred(cfv(cfa, c1), wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cn0)))
  nn0ge0d(cfv(cfa, c1), wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cn0)))
  nnnn0d(cfv(cfa, c1), wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cn0)))
  adantl(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cn0), wcel(cfv(cfa, c1), cn))
  faccl(c1)
}

blocks.name: eftval
blocks.content: The value of a term in the series expansion of the exponential function. (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 21-Aug-2007.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 28-Apr-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm eftval(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cn0), wceq(cfv(c1, c0), co(co(c2, cexp, c0), cdiv, cfv(cfa, c0))))
  -| wceq(c1, cmpt(s0, cn0, co(co(c2, cexp, cv(s0)), cdiv, cfv(cfa, cv(s0)))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  fvmpt(s0, c0, cn0, c1, co(co(c2, cexp, c0), cdiv, cfv(cfa, c0)), co(co(c2, cexp, cv(s0)), cdiv, cfv(cfa, cv(s0))))
  oveq12d(co(c2, cexp, cv(s0)), cdiv, cfv(cfa, cv(s0)), co(c2, cexp, c0), cfv(cfa, c0), wceq(cv(s0), c0))
  oveq2(cv(s0), c0, c2, cexp)
  fveq2(cv(s0), c0, cfa)
  ovex(co(c2, cexp, c0), cdiv, cfv(cfa, c0))
  diff.cn0.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s0, co(c2, cexp, c0), cdiv, cfv(cfa, c0))
  diff.co.s(s0, c2, cexp, c0)
  diff.cexp.s(s0)
  diff.cdiv.s(s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cfa, c0)
  diff.cfa.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm eftval(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ ℕ0 →(c1 ` c0)=((c2[^]c0)[÷](! ` c0)))
  ⊣ c1 =(s0 ∈ ℕ0 ↦((c2[^]s0)[÷](! ` s0)))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
} = {
  fvmpt(s0, c0, cn0, c1, ((c2[^]c0)[÷](! ` c0)), ((c2[^]s0)[÷](! ` s0)))
  oveq12d((c2[^]s0), cdiv, (! ` s0), (c2[^]c0), (! ` c0), s0 = c0)
  oveq2(s0, c0, c2, cexp)
  fveq2(s0, c0, cfa)
  ovex((c2[^]c0), cdiv, (! ` c0))
  diff.cn0.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s0, (c2[^]c0), cdiv, (! ` c0))
  diff.co.s(s0, c2, cexp, c0)
  diff.cexp.s(s0)
  diff.cdiv.s(s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cfa, c0)
  diff.cfa.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: efcllem
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ efcl . The series that defines the exponential function converges, in the case where its argument is nonzero. The ratio test ~ cvgrat is used to show convergence. (Contributed by NM, 26-Apr-2005.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 28-Apr-2014.) (Proof shortened by AV, 9-Jul-2022.)

blocks.name: ef0lem
blocks.content: The series defining the exponential function converges in the (trivial) case of a zero argument. (Contributed by Steve Rodriguez, 7-Jun-2006.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 28-Apr-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm ef0lem(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wceq(c0, nat0), wbr(cseq(nat0, caddc, c1), cli, nat1))
  -| wceq(c1, cmpt(s0, cn0, co(co(c0, cexp, cv(s0)), cdiv, cfv(cfa, cv(s0)))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
} = {
  breqtrd(cseq(nat0, caddc, c1), cli, nat1, cfv(cseq(nat0, caddc, c1), nat0), wceq(c0, nat0))
  fsumcvg2(hs0, nat0, c1, nat0, csn(nat0), nat1, wceq(c0, nat0))
  syldan(wceq(c0, nat0), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cuz, nat0)), wceq(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), cif(nat1, nat0, wcel(cv(hs0), csn(nat0)))), wo(wcel(cv(hs0), cn), wceq(cv(hs0), nat0)))
  sylib(wa(wceq(c0, nat0), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cuz, nat0))), wo(wcel(cv(hs0), cn), wceq(cv(hs0), nat0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cn0))
  syl6eleqr(cv(hs0), cn0, cfv(cuz, nat0), wa(wceq(c0, nat0), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cuz, nat0))))
  simpr(wceq(c0, nat0), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cuz, nat0)))
  elnn0(cv(hs0))
  jaodan(wceq(c0, nat0), wcel(cv(hs0), cn), wceq(cv(hs0), nat0), wceq(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), cif(nat1, nat0, wcel(cv(hs0), csn(nat0)))))
  eqtr4d(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), cif(nat1, nat0, wcel(cv(hs0), csn(nat0))), nat0, wa(wceq(c0, nat0), wcel(cv(hs0), cn)))
  3eqtrd(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), nat0, co(co(c0, cexp, cv(hs0)), cdiv, cfv(cfa, cv(hs0))), co(nat0, cdiv, cfv(cfa, cv(hs0))), wa(wceq(c0, nat0), wcel(cv(hs0), cn)))
  syl(wa(wceq(c0, nat0), wcel(cv(hs0), cn)), wceq(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), co(co(c0, cexp, cv(hs0)), cdiv, cfv(cfa, cv(hs0)))), wcel(cv(hs0), cn0))
  eftval(s0, cv(hs0), c1, c0)
  oveq1d(co(c0, cexp, cv(hs0)), cdiv, cfv(cfa, cv(hs0)), nat0, wa(wceq(c0, nat0), wcel(cv(hs0), cn)))
  sylan9eq(co(c0, cexp, cv(hs0)), nat0, co(nat0, cexp, cv(hs0)), wceq(c0, nat0), wcel(cv(hs0), cn))
  oveq1(c0, nat0, cexp, cv(hs0))
  0exp(cv(hs0))
  3syl(wa(wceq(c0, nat0), wcel(cv(hs0), cn)), wceq(co(nat0, cdiv, cfv(cfa, cv(hs0))), nat0), wcel(cv(hs0), cn0), wcel(cfv(cfa, cv(hs0)), cn))
  adantl(wceq(c0, nat0), wcel(cv(hs0), cn), wcel(cv(hs0), cn0))
  nnnn0(cv(hs0))
  faccl(cv(hs0))
  div0d(cfv(cfa, cv(hs0)), wcel(cfv(cfa, cv(hs0)), cn))
  nncn(cfv(cfa, cv(hs0)))
  nnne0(cfv(cfa, cv(hs0)))
  iffalsed(nat1, nat0, wa(wceq(c0, nat0), wcel(cv(hs0), cn)), wcel(cv(hs0), csn(nat0)))
  adantl(wceq(c0, nat0), wcel(cv(hs0), cn), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), csn(nat0))))
  sylibr(wcel(cv(hs0), cn), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), csn(nat0))), wne(cv(hs0), nat0))
  nnne0(cv(hs0))
  necon3bbii(cv(hs0), nat0, wcel(cv(hs0), csn(nat0)))
  eqtr4d(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), cif(nat1, nat0, wcel(cv(hs0), csn(nat0))), nat1, wa(wceq(c0, nat0), wceq(cv(hs0), nat0)))
  sylan9eqr(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), nat1, cfv(c1, nat0), wceq(c0, nat0), wceq(cv(hs0), nat0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), nat0, c1)
  iftrued(nat1, nat0, wa(wceq(c0, nat0), wceq(cv(hs0), nat0)), wcel(cv(hs0), csn(nat0)))

  oveq1(c0, nat0, cexp, nat0)
  0exp0e1()
  ax-mp(wceq(cfv(c1, nat0), co(co(c0, cexp, nat0), cdiv, cfv(cfa, nat0))), wcel(nat0, cn0))
  0nn0()
  eftval(s0, nat0, c1, c0)
  eqtr2i(nat1, co(nat1, cdiv, cfv(cfa, nat0)), co(nat1, cdiv, nat1))
  oveq2i(nat1, cdiv, cfv(cfa, nat0), nat1)
  fac0()
  1div1e1()

  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(csn(nat0))
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(c0, nat0))

thm ef0lem(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (c0 = 0 → seq(0(+, c1))[~~>]1)
  ⊣ c1 =(s0 ∈ ℕ0 ↦((c0[^]s0)[÷](! ` s0)))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
} = {
  breqtrd(seq(0(+, c1)), cli, nat1, (seq(0(+, c1))` 0), c0 = 0)
  fsumcvg2(hs0, nat0, c1, nat0, { 0 }, nat1, c0 = 0)
  syldan(c0 = 0, hs0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` 0), (c1 ` hs0)= if(hs0 ∈ { 0 }, 1, 0), (hs0 ∈ ℕ ∨ hs0 = 0))
  sylib((c0 = 0 ∧ hs0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` 0)), (hs0 ∈ ℕ ∨ hs0 = 0), hs0 ∈ ℕ0)
  syl6eleqr(hs0, cn0, (ℤ≥ ` 0), (c0 = 0 ∧ hs0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` 0)))
  simpr(c0 = 0, hs0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` 0))
  elnn0(hs0)
  jaodan(c0 = 0, hs0 ∈ ℕ, hs0 = 0, (c1 ` hs0)= if(hs0 ∈ { 0 }, 1, 0))
  eqtr4d((c1 ` hs0), if(hs0 ∈ { 0 }, 1, 0), nat0, (c0 = 0 ∧ hs0 ∈ ℕ))
  3eqtrd((c1 ` hs0), nat0, ((c0[^]hs0)[÷](! ` hs0)), (0[÷](! ` hs0)), (c0 = 0 ∧ hs0 ∈ ℕ))
  syl((c0 = 0 ∧ hs0 ∈ ℕ), (c1 ` hs0)=((c0[^]hs0)[÷](! ` hs0)), hs0 ∈ ℕ0)
  eftval(s0, hs0, c1, c0)
  oveq1d((c0[^]hs0), cdiv, (! ` hs0), nat0, (c0 = 0 ∧ hs0 ∈ ℕ))
  sylan9eq((c0[^]hs0), nat0, (0[^]hs0), c0 = 0, hs0 ∈ ℕ)
  oveq1(c0, nat0, cexp, hs0)
  0exp(hs0)
  3syl((c0 = 0 ∧ hs0 ∈ ℕ), (0[÷](! ` hs0))= 0, hs0 ∈ ℕ0, (! ` hs0)∈ ℕ)
  adantl(c0 = 0, hs0 ∈ ℕ, hs0 ∈ ℕ0)
  nnnn0(hs0)
  faccl(hs0)
  div0d((! ` hs0), (! ` hs0)∈ ℕ)
  nncn((! ` hs0))
  nnne0((! ` hs0))
  iffalsed(nat1, nat0, (c0 = 0 ∧ hs0 ∈ ℕ), hs0 ∈ { 0 })
  adantl(c0 = 0, hs0 ∈ ℕ, ¬ hs0 ∈ { 0 })
  sylibr(hs0 ∈ ℕ, ¬ hs0 ∈ { 0 }, hs0 ≠ 0)
  nnne0(hs0)
  necon3bbii(hs0, nat0, hs0 ∈ { 0 })
  eqtr4d((c1 ` hs0), if(hs0 ∈ { 0 }, 1, 0), nat1, (c0 = 0 ∧ hs0 = 0))
  sylan9eqr((c1 ` hs0), nat1, (c1 ` 0), c0 = 0, hs0 = 0)
  fveq2(hs0, nat0, c1)
  iftrued(nat1, nat0, (c0 = 0 ∧ hs0 = 0), hs0 ∈ { 0 })
  sylibr((c0 = 0 ∧ hs0 = 0), hs0 ∈ { 0 }, hs0 = 0)
  simpr(c0 = 0, hs0 = 0)
  velsn(hs0, nat0)
  a1i(c0 = 0, 0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` 0))
  eleqtri(nat0, (ℤ≥ ` 0), cn0)
  nn0uz()
  1cnd((c0 = 0 ∧ hs0 ∈ { 0 }))
  a1i(c0 = 0, { 0 } ⊆(0[...]0))
  eqimss2i({ 0 }, (0[...]0))
  fz0sn()
  seq1i(nat0, caddc, c1, nat1, c0 = 0)
  0z()
  3eqtr4g((c1 ` 0), nat1, ((c0[^]0)[÷](! ` 0)), (1[÷](! ` 0)), c0 = 0)
  oveq1d((c0[^]0), cdiv, (! ` 0), nat1, c0 = 0)
  syl6eq((c0[^]0), nat1, (0[^]0), c0 = 0)

  -| diffsc(s0, c0)

blocks.name: reefcld
blocks.content: The exponential function is real if its argument is real. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 29-May-2016.)

blocks.name: ere

blocks.name: ef0
blocks.content: Value of the exponential function at 0. Equation 2 of [Gleason] p. 308. (Contributed by Steve Rodriguez, 27-Jun-2006.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 28-Apr-2014.)

thm ef0() {

thm efaddlem(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {

  -| wceq(c4, cmpt(s0, cn0, co(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cexp, cv(s0)), cdiv, cfv(cfa, cv(s0)))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cc))

  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {

  mertens(hs0, hs1, c4, co(co(c0, cexp, cv(hs0)), cdiv, cfv(cfa, cv(hs0))), co(co(c1, cexp, cv(hs1)), cdiv, cfv(cfa, cv(hs1))), c2, cmpt(s0, cn0, co(co(cfv(cabs, c0), cexp, cv(s0)), cdiv, cfv(cfa, cv(s0)))), c3, w0)

  absidd(cfv(cfa, cv(hs0)), wcel(cfv(cfa, cv(hs0)), cn))

blocks.name: efadd
blocks.content: Sum of exponents law for exponential function. (Contributed by NM, 10-Jan-2006.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 29-Apr-2014.)

blocks.name: fprodefsum
blocks.content: Move the exponential function from inside a finite product to outside a finite sum. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 26-Dec-2017.)

blocks.name: efcan
blocks.content: Cancellation law for exponential function. Equation 27 of [Rudin] p. 164. (Contributed by NM, 13-Jan-2006.)

blocks.name: efne0
blocks.content: The exponential of a complex number is nonzero. Corollary 15-4.3 of [Gleason] p. 309. (Contributed by NM, 13-Jan-2006.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 29-Apr-2014.)

}

blocks.name: efneg
blocks.content: The exponential of the opposite is the inverse of the exponential. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 10-May-2014.)

blocks.name: efzval
blocks.content: Value of the exponential function for integers. Special case of ~ efval . Equation 30 of [Rudin] p. 164. (Contributed by Steve Rodriguez, 15-Sep-2006.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 5-Jun-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm efzval(class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cz), wceq(cfv(ce, c0), co(ceu, cexp, c0)))
} = {
  syl6eqr(cfv(ce, c0), co(ceu, cexp, c0), co(cfv(ce, nat1), cexp, c0), wcel(c0, cz))
  eqtr3d(cfv(ce, c0), co(cfv(ce, nat1), cexp, c0), cfv(ce, co(c0, cmul, nat1)), wcel(c0, cz))
  fveq2d(ce, co(c0, cmul, nat1), c0, wcel(c0, cz))
  mulid1d(c0, wcel(c0, cz))
  zcn(c0)
  mpan(wcel(c0, cz), wceq(cfv(ce, co(c0, cmul, nat1)), co(cfv(ce, nat1), cexp, c0)), wcel(nat1, cc))
  ax-1cn()
  efexp(nat1, c0)
  oveq1i(ceu, cexp, c0, cfv(ce, nat1))
  df-e()
}

thm efzval(class c0) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ ℤ →(exp ` c0)=(e[^]c0))
} = {
  syl6eqr((exp ` c0), (e[^]c0), ((exp ` 1)[^]c0), c0 ∈ ℤ)
  eqtr3d((exp ` c0), ((exp ` 1)[^]c0), (exp `(c0[×]1)), c0 ∈ ℤ)
  fveq2d(ce, (c0[×]1), c0, c0 ∈ ℤ)
  mulid1d(c0, c0 ∈ ℤ)
  zcn(c0)
  mpan(c0 ∈ ℤ, (exp `(c0[×]1))=((exp ` 1)[^]c0), 1 ∈ ℂ)
  ax-1cn()
  efexp(nat1, c0)
  oveq1i(ceu, cexp, c0, (exp ` 1))
  df-e()
}

blocks.name: eftlcvg
blocks.content: The tail series of the exponential function are convergent. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 29-Apr-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm eftlcvg(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cn0)), wcel(cseq(c1, caddc, c2), cdm(cli)))
  -| wceq(c2, cmpt(s0, cn0, co(co(c0, cexp, cv(s0)), cdiv, cfv(cfa, cv(s0)))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cn0)), wcel(cseq(c1, caddc, c2), cdm(cli))), diffsc(s0, c1))
  mpbid(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cn0)), wcel(cseq(c1, caddc, c2), cdm(cli)), wcel(cseq(nat0, caddc, c2), cdm(cli)))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cn0), wcel(cseq(nat0, caddc, c2), cdm(cli)))
  efcllem(s0, c0, c2)
  iserex(hs0, nat0, c2, c1, cn0, wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cn0)))
  nn0uz()
  simpr(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cn0))
  eqeltrd(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), cc, co(co(c0, cexp, cv(hs0)), cdiv, cfv(cfa, cv(hs0))), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cn0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cn0)))
  adantl(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cn0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cn0), wceq(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), co(co(c0, cexp, cv(hs0)), cdiv, cfv(cfa, cv(hs0)))))
  eftval(s0, cv(hs0), c2, c0)
  adantlr(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cn0), wcel(cv(hs0), cn0), wcel(co(co(c0, cexp, cv(hs0)), cdiv, cfv(cfa, cv(hs0))), cc))
  eftcl(c0, cv(hs0))
  diff.hs0.c(nat0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cn0)
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cn0)))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm eftlcvg(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ ℂ ∧ c1 ∈ ℕ0)→ seq(c1(+, c2))∈ dom(~~>))
  ⊣ c2 =(s0 ∈ ℕ0 ↦((c0[^]s0)[÷](! ` s0)))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
} = {
  a1ii(((c0 ∈ ℂ ∧ c1 ∈ ℕ0)→ seq(c1(+, c2))∈ dom(~~>)), d(s0, c1))
  mpbid((c0 ∈ ℂ ∧ c1 ∈ ℕ0), seq(c1(+, c2))∈ dom(~~>), seq(0(+, c2))∈ dom(~~>))
  adantr(c0 ∈ ℂ, c1 ∈ ℕ0, seq(0(+, c2))∈ dom(~~>))
  efcllem(s0, c0, c2)
  iserex(hs0, nat0, c2, c1, cn0, (c0 ∈ ℂ ∧ c1 ∈ ℕ0))
  nn0uz()
  simpr(c0 ∈ ℂ, c1 ∈ ℕ0)
  eqeltrd((c2 ` hs0), cc, ((c0[^]hs0)[÷](! ` hs0)), ((c0 ∈ ℂ ∧ c1 ∈ ℕ0)∧ hs0 ∈ ℕ0))
  adantl((c0 ∈ ℂ ∧ c1 ∈ ℕ0), hs0 ∈ ℕ0, (c2 ` hs0)=((c0[^]hs0)[÷](! ` hs0)))
  eftval(s0, hs0, c2, c0)
  adantlr(c0 ∈ ℂ, c1 ∈ ℕ0, hs0 ∈ ℕ0, ((c0[^]hs0)[÷](! ` hs0))∈ ℂ)
  eftcl(c0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.c(nat0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cn0)
  diff.hs0.w((c0 ∈ ℂ ∧ c1 ∈ ℕ0))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: eftlcl
blocks.content: Closure of the sum of an infinite tail of the series defining the exponential function. (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 17-Jan-2008.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 30-Apr-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm eftlcl(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cn0)), wcel(csu(s0, cfv(cuz, c1), cfv(c2, cv(s0))), cc))
  -| wceq(c2, cmpt(s1, cn0, co(co(c0, cexp, cv(s1)), cdiv, cfv(cfa, cv(s1)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
} = {
  isumcl(s0, cfv(cuz, c1), cfv(c2, cv(s0)), c1, c2, wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cn0)))
  eqid(cfv(cuz, c1))
  adantl(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cn0), wcel(c1, cz))
  nn0z(c1)
  eqidd(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cn0)), wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cuz, c1))))
  eqeltrd(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cc, co(co(c0, cexp, cv(s0)), cdiv, cfv(cfa, cv(s0))), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cn0)), wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cuz, c1))))
  syl(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cn0)), wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cuz, c1))), wceq(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), co(co(c0, cexp, cv(s0)), cdiv, cfv(cfa, cv(s0)))), wcel(cv(s0), cn0))
  eftval(s1, cv(s0), c2, c0)
  syl2anc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cn0)), wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cuz, c1))), wcel(co(co(c0, cexp, cv(s0)), cdiv, cfv(cfa, cv(s0))), cc), wcel(c0, cc), wcel(cv(s0), cn0))
  simpll(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cn0), wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cuz, c1)))
  adantll(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cn0), wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cuz, c1)), wcel(cv(s0), cn0))
  eluznn0(c1, cv(s0))
  eftcl(c0, cv(s0))
  eftlcvg(s1, c0, c1, c2)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cuz, c1)
  diff.cuz.s(s0)
  diff.wa.s(s0, wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cn0))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, cc)
  diff.cc.s(s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c1, cn0)
  diff.cn0.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm eftlcl(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ ℂ ∧ c1 ∈ ℕ0)→ sum(s0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c1),(c2 ` s0))∈ ℂ)
  ⊣ c2 =(s1 ∈ ℕ0 ↦((c0[^]s1)[÷](! ` s1)))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
} = {
  isumcl(s0, (ℤ≥ ` c1), (c2 ` s0), c1, c2, (c0 ∈ ℂ ∧ c1 ∈ ℕ0))
  eqid((ℤ≥ ` c1))
  adantl(c0 ∈ ℂ, c1 ∈ ℕ0, c1 ∈ ℤ)
  nn0z(c1)
  eqidd((c2 ` s0), ((c0 ∈ ℂ ∧ c1 ∈ ℕ0)∧ s0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c1)))
  eqeltrd((c2 ` s0), cc, ((c0[^]s0)[÷](! ` s0)), ((c0 ∈ ℂ ∧ c1 ∈ ℕ0)∧ s0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c1)))
  syl(((c0 ∈ ℂ ∧ c1 ∈ ℕ0)∧ s0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c1)), (c2 ` s0)=((c0[^]s0)[÷](! ` s0)), s0 ∈ ℕ0)
  eftval(s1, s0, c2, c0)

blocks.name: reeftlcl
blocks.content: Closure of the sum of an infinite tail of the series defining the exponential function. (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 17-Jan-2008.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 30-Apr-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm reeftlcl(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cn0)), wcel(csu(s0, cfv(cuz, c1), cfv(c2, cv(s0))), cr))
  -| wceq(c2, cmpt(s1, cn0, co(co(c0, cexp, cv(s1)), cdiv, cfv(cfa, cv(s1)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
} = {
  isumrecl(s0, cfv(cuz, c1), cfv(c2, cv(s0)), c1, c2, wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cn0)))
  eqid(cfv(cuz, c1))
  adantl(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cn0), wcel(c1, cz))
  nn0z(c1)
  eqidd(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cn0)), wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cuz, c1))))

  syl(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cn0)), wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cuz, c1))), wceq(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), co(co(c0, cexp, cv(s0)), cdiv, cfv(cfa, cv(s0)))), wcel(cv(s0), cn0))
  eftval(s1, cv(s0), c2, c0)
  syl2anc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cn0)), wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cuz, c1))), wcel(co(co(c0, cexp, cv(s0)), cdiv, cfv(cfa, cv(s0))), cr), wcel(c0, cr), wcel(cv(s0), cn0))
  simpll(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cn0), wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cuz, c1)))
  adantll(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cn0), wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cuz, c1)), wcel(cv(s0), cn0))

  diff.cr.s(s0)

  diff.cn0.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

thm reeftlcl(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ ℝ ∧ c1 ∈ ℕ0)→ sum(s0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c1),(c2 ` s0))∈ ℝ)
  ⊣ c2 =(s1 ∈ ℕ0 ↦((c0[^]s1)[÷](! ` s1)))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
} = {
  isumrecl(s0, (ℤ≥ ` c1), (c2 ` s0), c1, c2, (c0 ∈ ℝ ∧ c1 ∈ ℕ0))
  eqid((ℤ≥ ` c1))
  adantl(c0 ∈ ℝ, c1 ∈ ℕ0, c1 ∈ ℤ)
  nn0z(c1)
  eqidd((c2 ` s0), ((c0 ∈ ℝ ∧ c1 ∈ ℕ0)∧ s0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c1)))
  eqeltrd((c2 ` s0), cr, ((c0[^]s0)[÷](! ` s0)), ((c0 ∈ ℝ ∧ c1 ∈ ℕ0)∧ s0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c1)))
  syl(((c0 ∈ ℝ ∧ c1 ∈ ℕ0)∧ s0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c1)), (c2 ` s0)=((c0[^]s0)[÷](! ` s0)), s0 ∈ ℕ0)
  eftval(s1, s0, c2, c0)
  syl2anc(((c0 ∈ ℝ ∧ c1 ∈ ℕ0)∧ s0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c1)), ((c0[^]s0)[÷](! ` s0))∈ ℝ, c0 ∈ ℝ, s0 ∈ ℕ0)
  simpll(c0 ∈ ℝ, c1 ∈ ℕ0, s0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c1))
  adantll(c0 ∈ ℝ, c1 ∈ ℕ0, s0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c1), s0 ∈ ℕ0)
  eluznn0(c1, s0)
  reeftcl(c0, s0)
  sylan(c0 ∈ ℝ, c1 ∈ ℕ0, seq(c1(+, c2))∈ dom(~~>), c0 ∈ ℂ)
  recn(c0)
  eftlcvg(s1, c0, c1, c2)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cuz, c1)
  diff.cuz.s(s0)
  diff.wa.s(s0, c0 ∈ ℝ, c1 ∈ ℕ0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, cr)
  diff.cr.s(s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c1, cn0)
  diff.cn0.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

thm effsumlt(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {

  ltaddrpd(cfv(cseq(nat0, caddc, c0), c1), csu(hs0, cfv(cuz, co(c1, caddc, nat1)), cfv(c0, cv(hs0))), w0)
  ffvelrnd(cseq(nat0, caddc, c0), c1, cr, cn0, w0)
  serfre(hs0, nat0, c0, cn0, w0)
  0zd(w0)
  isumrpcl(hs0, cfv(cuz, co(c1, caddc, nat1)), cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cn0, nat0, co(c1, caddc, nat1), c0, w0)
  eqeltrd(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), crp, co(co(c2, cexp, cv(hs0)), cdiv, cfv(cfa, cv(hs0))), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cn0)))
  rpdivcld(co(c2, cexp, cv(hs0)), cfv(cfa, cv(hs0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cn0)))
  syl2an(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cn0), wcel(co(c2, cexp, cv(hs0)), crp), wcel(c2, crp), wcel(cv(hs0), cz))
  nn0z(cv(hs0))
  rpexpcl(c2, cv(hs0))
  nnrpd(cfv(cfa, cv(hs0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cn0)))
  adantl(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cn0), wcel(cfv(cfa, cv(hs0)), cn))
  faccl(cv(hs0))
  3eqtrd(cfv(ce, c2), co(cfv(cseq(nat0, caddc, c0), c1), caddc, csu(hs0, cfv(cuz, co(c1, caddc, nat1)), cfv(c0, cv(hs0)))), csu(hs0, cn0, cfv(c0, cv(hs0))), co(csu(hs0, co(nat0, cfz, co(co(c1, caddc, nat1), cmin, nat1)), cfv(c0, cv(hs0))), caddc, csu(hs0, cfv(cuz, co(c1, caddc, nat1)), cfv(c0, cv(hs0)))), w0)
  syl(w0, wceq(cfv(ce, c2), csu(hs0, cn0, cfv(c0, cv(hs0)))), wcel(c2, cc))
  efval2(hs0, s0, c2, c0)
  isumsplit(hs0, cn0, cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), nat0, co(c1, caddc, nat1), cfv(cuz, co(c1, caddc, nat1)), c0, w0)
  eqid(cfv(cuz, co(c1, caddc, nat1)))

  peano2nn0(c1)

  syl(w0, wcel(cseq(nat0, caddc, c0), cdm(cli)), wcel(c2, cc))
  recnd(c2, w0)
  efcllem(s0, c2, c0)
  oveq1d(csu(hs0, co(nat0, cfz, co(co(c1, caddc, nat1), cmin, nat1)), cfv(c0, cv(hs0))), caddc, csu(hs0, cfv(cuz, co(c1, caddc, nat1)), cfv(c0, cv(hs0))), cfv(cseq(nat0, caddc, c0), c1), w0)
  eqtrd(csu(hs0, co(nat0, cfz, co(co(c1, caddc, nat1), cmin, nat1)), cfv(c0, cv(hs0))), cfv(cseq(nat0, caddc, c0), c1), csu(hs0, co(nat0, cfz, c1), cfv(c0, cv(hs0))), w0)
  sumeq1d(hs0, co(nat0, cfz, co(co(c1, caddc, nat1), cmin, nat1)), cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), co(nat0, cfz, c1), w0)

blocks.pretty:
thm effsumlt(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(seq(0(+, c0))` c1)[<](exp ` c2))
  ⊣ c0 =(s0 ∈ ℕ0 ↦((c2[^]s0)[÷](! ` s0)))
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ ℝ+)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ ℕ0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
} = {
  breqtrrd((seq(0(+, c0))` c1), clt, (exp ` c2), ((seq(0(+, c0))` c1)[+]sum(hs0 ∈(ℤ≥ `(c1[+]1)),(c0 ` hs0))), w0)
  ltaddrpd((seq(0(+, c0))` c1), sum(hs0 ∈(ℤ≥ `(c1[+]1)),(c0 ` hs0)), w0)
  ffvelrnd(seq(0(+, c0)), c1, cr, cn0, w0)
  serfre(hs0, nat0, c0, cn0, w0)
  0zd(w0)
  isumrpcl(hs0, (ℤ≥ `(c1[+]1)), (c0 ` hs0), cn0, nat0, (c1[+]1), c0, w0)
  eqeltrd((c0 ` hs0), crp, ((c2[^]hs0)[÷](! ` hs0)), (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ ℕ0))
  rpdivcld((c2[^]hs0), (! ` hs0), (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ ℕ0))
  syl2an(w0, hs0 ∈ ℕ0, (c2[^]hs0)∈ ℝ+, c2 ∈ ℝ+, hs0 ∈ ℤ)
  nn0z(hs0)
  rpexpcl(c2, hs0)
  nnrpd((! ` hs0), (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ ℕ0))

  ssid(cr)

  fveq2(hs0, hs1, ce)

  fveq2(hs0, c1, ce)
  ssid(cr)
  adantl(wtru, hs0 ∈ ℝ, (exp ` hs0)∈ ℝ)
  reefcl(hs0)

  3expia(hs0 ∈ ℝ, hs1 ∈ ℝ, hs0[<]hs1, (exp ` hs0)[<](exp ` hs1))
  breqtrd((exp ` hs0), clt, (exp ` hs1), ((exp ` hs0)[×](exp `(hs1[-]hs0))), (hs0 ∈ ℝ ∧ hs1 ∈ ℝ ∧ hs0[<]hs1))
  mpbid((hs0 ∈ ℝ ∧ hs1 ∈ ℝ ∧ hs0[<]hs1), (exp ` hs0)[<]((exp ` hs0)[×](exp `(hs1[-]hs0))), 1[<](exp `(hs1[-]hs0)))
  syl((hs0 ∈ ℝ ∧ hs1 ∈ ℝ ∧ hs0[<]hs1), 1[<](exp `(hs1[-]hs0)), (hs1[-]hs0)∈ ℝ+)
  elrpd((hs1[-]hs0), (hs0 ∈ ℝ ∧ hs1 ∈ ℝ ∧ hs0[<]hs1))
  biimp3a(hs0 ∈ ℝ, hs1 ∈ ℝ, hs0[<]hs1, 0[<](hs1[-]hs0))
  posdif(hs0, hs1)
  efgt1((hs1[-]hs0))
  syl3anc((hs0 ∈ ℝ ∧ hs1 ∈ ℝ ∧ hs0[<]hs1), (1[<](exp `(hs1[-]hs0))↔(exp ` hs0)[<]((exp ` hs0)[×](exp `(hs1[-]hs0)))), (exp ` hs0)∈ ℝ, (exp `(hs1[-]hs0))∈ ℝ, 0[<](exp ` hs0))

  eqtr3d(((exp ` hs0)[×](exp `(hs1[-]hs0))), (exp ` hs1), (exp `(hs0[+](hs1[-]hs0))), (hs0 ∈ ℝ ∧ hs1 ∈ ℝ ∧ hs0[<]hs1))
  syl2anc((hs0 ∈ ℝ ∧ hs1 ∈ ℝ ∧ hs0[<]hs1), (exp `(hs0[+](hs1[-]hs0)))=((exp ` hs0)[×](exp `(hs1[-]hs0))), hs0 ∈ ℂ, (hs1[-]hs0)∈ ℂ)
  recnd((hs1[-]hs0), (hs0 ∈ ℝ ∧ hs1 ∈ ℝ ∧ hs0[<]hs1))

  recnd(hs0, (hs0 ∈ ℝ ∧ hs1 ∈ ℝ ∧ hs0[<]hs1))
  simp1(hs0 ∈ ℝ, hs1 ∈ ℝ, hs0[<]hs1)

blocks.name: efle
blocks.content: The exponential function on the reals is nondecreasing. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Mar-2014.)

blocks.name: reef11
blocks.content: The exponential function on real numbers is one-to-one. (Contributed by NM, 21-Aug-2008.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 11-Mar-2014.)

blocks.name: retancl
blocks.content: The closure of the tangent function with a real argument. (Contributed by David A. Wheeler, 15-Mar-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm retancl(class c0) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wne(cfv(ccos, c0), nat0)), wcel(cfv(ctan, c0), cr))
} = {
  eqeltrd(cfv(ctan, c0), cr, co(cfv(csin, c0), cdiv, cfv(ccos, c0)), wa(wcel(c0, cr), wne(cfv(ccos, c0), nat0)))
  sylan(wcel(c0, cr), wne(cfv(ccos, c0), nat0), wceq(cfv(ctan, c0), co(cfv(csin, c0), cdiv, cfv(ccos, c0))), wcel(c0, cc))
  recn(c0)
  tanval(c0)
  3anidm12(wcel(c0, cr), wne(cfv(ccos, c0), nat0), wcel(co(cfv(csin, c0), cdiv, cfv(ccos, c0)), cr))
  syl3an2(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c0, cr), wne(cfv(ccos, c0), nat0), wcel(co(cfv(csin, c0), cdiv, cfv(ccos, c0)), cr), wcel(cfv(ccos, c0), cr))
  recoscl(c0)
  syl3an1(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(cfv(ccos, c0), cr), wne(cfv(ccos, c0), nat0), wcel(co(cfv(csin, c0), cdiv, cfv(ccos, c0)), cr), wcel(cfv(csin, c0), cr))
  resincl(c0)
  redivcl(cfv(csin, c0), cfv(ccos, c0))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm retancl(class c0) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ ℝ ∧(cos ` c0)≠ 0)→(tan ` c0)∈ ℝ)
} = {
  eqeltrd((tan ` c0), cr, ((sin ` c0)[÷](cos ` c0)), (c0 ∈ ℝ ∧(cos ` c0)≠ 0))
  sylan(c0 ∈ ℝ, (cos ` c0)≠ 0, (tan ` c0)=((sin ` c0)[÷](cos ` c0)), c0 ∈ ℂ)
  recn(c0)
  tanval(c0)
  3anidm12(c0 ∈ ℝ, (cos ` c0)≠ 0, ((sin ` c0)[÷](cos ` c0))∈ ℝ)
  syl3an2(c0 ∈ ℝ, c0 ∈ ℝ, (cos ` c0)≠ 0, ((sin ` c0)[÷](cos ` c0))∈ ℝ, (cos ` c0)∈ ℝ)
  recoscl(c0)
  syl3an1(c0 ∈ ℝ, (cos ` c0)∈ ℝ, (cos ` c0)≠ 0, ((sin ` c0)[÷](cos ` c0))∈ ℝ, (sin ` c0)∈ ℝ)
  resincl(c0)
  redivcl((sin ` c0), (cos ` c0))
}

thm sinneg(class c0) {

  syl(wcel(c0, cc), wceq(cfv(csin, cneg(c0)), co(co(cfv(ce, co(ci, cmul, cneg(c0))), cmin, cfv(ce, co(cneg(ci), cmul, cneg(c0)))), cdiv, co(nat2, cmul, ci))), wcel(cneg(c0), cc))
  negcl(c0)

  eqtrd(cneg(cfv(csin, c0)), co(cneg(co(cfv(ce, co(ci, cmul, c0)), cmin, cfv(ce, co(cneg(ci), cmul, c0)))), cdiv, co(nat2, cmul, ci)), cneg(co(co(cfv(ce, co(ci, cmul, c0)), cmin, cfv(ce, co(cneg(ci), cmul, c0))), cdiv, co(nat2, cmul, ci))), wcel(c0, cc))
  negeqd(cfv(csin, c0), co(co(cfv(ce, co(ci, cmul, c0)), cmin, cfv(ce, co(cneg(ci), cmul, c0))), cdiv, co(nat2, cmul, ci)), wcel(c0, cc))
  sinval(c0)
  syl(wcel(c0, cc), wceq(cneg(co(co(cfv(ce, co(ci, cmul, c0)), cmin, cfv(ce, co(cneg(ci), cmul, c0))), cdiv, co(nat2, cmul, ci))), co(cneg(co(cfv(ce, co(ci, cmul, c0)), cmin, cfv(ce, co(cneg(ci), cmul, c0)))), cdiv, co(nat2, cmul, ci))), wcel(co(cfv(ce, co(ci, cmul, c0)), cmin, cfv(ce, co(cneg(ci), cmul, c0))), cc))
  subcld(cfv(ce, co(ci, cmul, c0)), cfv(ce, co(cneg(ci), cmul, c0)), wcel(c0, cc))
  mp3an23(wcel(co(cfv(ce, co(ci, cmul, c0)), cmin, cfv(ce, co(cneg(ci), cmul, c0))), cc), wceq(cneg(co(co(cfv(ce, co(ci, cmul, c0)), cmin, cfv(ce, co(cneg(ci), cmul, c0))), cdiv, co(nat2, cmul, ci))), co(cneg(co(cfv(ce, co(ci, cmul, c0)), cmin, cfv(ce, co(cneg(ci), cmul, c0)))), cdiv, co(nat2, cmul, ci))), wcel(co(nat2, cmul, ci), cc), wne(co(nat2, cmul, ci), nat0))
  2mulicn()
  2muline0()
  divneg(co(cfv(ce, co(ci, cmul, c0)), cmin, cfv(ce, co(cneg(ci), cmul, c0))), co(nat2, cmul, ci))
  oveq1d(co(cfv(ce, co(ci, cmul, cneg(c0))), cmin, cfv(ce, co(cneg(ci), cmul, cneg(c0)))), cdiv, co(nat2, cmul, ci), cneg(co(cfv(ce, co(ci, cmul, c0)), cmin, cfv(ce, co(cneg(ci), cmul, c0)))), wcel(c0, cc))
  eqtr4d(co(cfv(ce, co(ci, cmul, cneg(c0))), cmin, cfv(ce, co(cneg(ci), cmul, cneg(c0)))), cneg(co(cfv(ce, co(ci, cmul, c0)), cmin, cfv(ce, co(cneg(ci), cmul, c0)))), co(cfv(ce, co(cneg(ci), cmul, c0)), cmin, cfv(ce, co(ci, cmul, c0))), wcel(c0, cc))
  oveq12d(cfv(ce, co(ci, cmul, cneg(c0))), cmin, cfv(ce, co(cneg(ci), cmul, cneg(c0))), cfv(ce, co(cneg(ci), cmul, c0)), cfv(ce, co(ci, cmul, c0)), wcel(c0, cc))
  fveq2d(ce, co(ci, cmul, cneg(c0)), co(cneg(ci), cmul, c0), wcel(c0, cc))
  eqcomd(co(ci, cmul, cneg(c0)), co(cneg(ci), cmul, c0), wcel(c0, cc))
  mpan(wcel(c0, cc), wceq(co(cneg(ci), cmul, c0), co(ci, cmul, cneg(c0))), wcel(ci, cc))
  mulneg12(ci, c0)
  fveq2d(ce, co(cneg(ci), cmul, cneg(c0)), co(ci, cmul, c0), wcel(c0, cc))
  mpan(wcel(c0, cc), wceq(co(cneg(ci), cmul, cneg(c0)), co(ci, cmul, c0)), wcel(ci, cc))
  mul2neg(ci, c0)
  negsubdi2d(cfv(ce, co(ci, cmul, c0)), cfv(ce, co(cneg(ci), cmul, c0)), wcel(c0, cc))
  syl(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(cfv(ce, co(ci, cmul, c0)), cc), wcel(co(ci, cmul, c0), cc))

}

blocks.name: tanneg
blocks.content: The tangent of a negative is the negative of the tangent. (Contributed by David A. Wheeler, 23-Mar-2014.)

  sincl(c0)
  divneg(cfv(csin, c0), cfv(ccos, c0))
  negeqd(cfv(ctan, c0), co(cfv(csin, c0), cdiv, cfv(ccos, c0)), wa(wcel(c0, cc), wne(cfv(ccos, c0), nat0)))
  tanval(c0)
  eqtrd(cfv(ctan, cneg(c0)), co(cneg(cfv(csin, c0)), cdiv, cfv(ccos, c0)), co(cfv(csin, cneg(c0)), cdiv, cfv(ccos, cneg(c0))), wa(wcel(c0, cc), wne(cfv(ccos, c0), nat0)))

  tanval(cneg(c0))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cc), wne(cfv(ccos, c0), nat0), wceq(co(cfv(csin, cneg(c0)), cdiv, cfv(ccos, cneg(c0))), co(cneg(cfv(csin, c0)), cdiv, cfv(ccos, c0))))
  oveq12d(cfv(csin, cneg(c0)), cdiv, cfv(ccos, cneg(c0)), cneg(cfv(csin, c0)), cfv(ccos, c0), wcel(c0, cc))

  divneg((sin ` c0), (cos ` c0))

  eqtrd((tan ` -u(c0)), (-u((sin ` c0))[÷](cos ` c0)), ((sin ` -u(c0))[÷](cos ` -u(c0))), (c0 ∈ ℂ ∧(cos ` c0)≠ 0))
  syl2an2r(c0 ∈ ℂ, (cos ` c0)≠ 0, (tan ` -u(c0))=((sin ` -u(c0))[÷](cos ` -u(c0))), -u(c0)∈ ℂ, (cos ` -u(c0))≠ 0)

blocks.name: tanhbnd

thm tanhbnd(class c0) {

  tancld(co(ci, cmul, c0), wcel(c0, cr))

  ine0()
  oveq1d(cfv(ctan, co(ci, cmul, cneg(c0))), cdiv, ci, cneg(cfv(ctan, co(ci, cmul, c0))), wcel(c0, cr))
  eqtrd(cfv(ctan, co(ci, cmul, cneg(c0))), cneg(cfv(ctan, co(ci, cmul, c0))), cfv(ctan, cneg(co(ci, cmul, c0))), wcel(c0, cr))

  syl(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(co(cfv(ctan, co(ci, cmul, cneg(c0))), cdiv, ci), clt, nat1), wcel(cneg(c0), cr))
  renegcl(c0)

  sylancl(wcel(c0, cr), wb(wbr(cneg(co(cfv(ctan, co(ci, cmul, c0)), cdiv, ci)), clt, nat1), wbr(cneg(nat1), clt, co(cfv(ctan, co(ci, cmul, c0)), cdiv, ci))), wcel(co(cfv(ctan, co(ci, cmul, c0)), cdiv, ci), cr), wcel(nat1, cr))
  retanhcl(c0)

blocks.name: efeul
blocks.content: Eulerian representation of the complex exponential. (Suggested by Jeff Hankins, 3-Jul-2006.) (Contributed by NM, 4-Jul-2006.)
blocks.origin:
thm efeul(class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cc), wceq(cfv(ce, c0), co(cfv(ce, cfv(cre, c0)), cmul, co(cfv(ccos, cfv(cim, c0)), caddc, co(ci, cmul, cfv(csin, cfv(cim, c0)))))))
} = {
  3eqtrd(cfv(ce, c0), co(cfv(ce, cfv(cre, c0)), cmul, co(cfv(ccos, cfv(cim, c0)), caddc, co(ci, cmul, cfv(csin, cfv(cim, c0))))), cfv(ce, co(cfv(cre, c0), caddc, co(ci, cmul, cfv(cim, c0)))), co(cfv(ce, cfv(cre, c0)), cmul, cfv(ce, co(ci, cmul, cfv(cim, c0)))), wcel(c0, cc))
  fveq2d(ce, c0, co(cfv(cre, c0), caddc, co(ci, cmul, cfv(cim, c0))), wcel(c0, cc))
  replim(c0)
  syl2anc(wcel(c0, cc), wceq(cfv(ce, co(cfv(cre, c0), caddc, co(ci, cmul, cfv(cim, c0)))), co(cfv(ce, cfv(cre, c0)), cmul, cfv(ce, co(ci, cmul, cfv(cim, c0))))), wcel(cfv(cre, c0), cc), wcel(co(ci, cmul, cfv(cim, c0)), cc))
  recnd(cfv(cre, c0), wcel(c0, cc))
  recl(c0)
  sylancr(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(co(ci, cmul, cfv(cim, c0)), cc), wcel(ci, cc), wcel(cfv(cim, c0), cc))
  ax-icn()
  mulcl(ci, cfv(cim, c0))
  efadd(cfv(cre, c0), co(ci, cmul, cfv(cim, c0)))
  oveq2d(cfv(ce, cfv(cre, c0)), cmul, cfv(ce, co(ci, cmul, cfv(cim, c0))), co(cfv(ccos, cfv(cim, c0)), caddc, co(ci, cmul, cfv(csin, cfv(cim, c0)))), wcel(c0, cc))
  syl(wcel(c0, cc), wceq(cfv(ce, co(ci, cmul, cfv(cim, c0))), co(cfv(ccos, cfv(cim, c0)), caddc, co(ci, cmul, cfv(csin, cfv(cim, c0))))), wcel(cfv(cim, c0), cc))
  recnd(cfv(cim, c0), wcel(c0, cc))
  imcl(c0)
  efival(cfv(cim, c0))
}

thm efeul(class c0) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ ℂ →(exp ` c0)=((exp `(Re ` c0))[×]((cos `(Im ` c0))[+](i[×](sin `(Im ` c0))))))
} = {
  3eqtrd((exp ` c0), ((exp `(Re ` c0))[×]((cos `(Im ` c0))[+](i[×](sin `(Im ` c0))))), (exp `((Re ` c0)[+](i[×](Im ` c0)))), ((exp `(Re ` c0))[×](exp `(i[×](Im ` c0)))), c0 ∈ ℂ)
  fveq2d(ce, c0, ((Re ` c0)[+](i[×](Im ` c0))), c0 ∈ ℂ)
  replim(c0)
  syl2anc(c0 ∈ ℂ, (exp `((Re ` c0)[+](i[×](Im ` c0))))=((exp `(Re ` c0))[×](exp `(i[×](Im ` c0)))), (Re ` c0)∈ ℂ, (i[×](Im ` c0))∈ ℂ)
  recnd((Re ` c0), c0 ∈ ℂ)
  recl(c0)
  sylancr(c0 ∈ ℂ, (i[×](Im ` c0))∈ ℂ, i ∈ ℂ, (Im ` c0)∈ ℂ)
  ax-icn()
  mulcl(ci, (Im ` c0))
  efadd((Re ` c0), (i[×](Im ` c0)))
  oveq2d((exp `(Re ` c0)), cmul, (exp `(i[×](Im ` c0))), ((cos `(Im ` c0))[+](i[×](sin `(Im ` c0)))), c0 ∈ ℂ)
  syl(c0 ∈ ℂ, (exp `(i[×](Im ` c0)))=((cos `(Im ` c0))[+](i[×](sin `(Im ` c0)))), (Im ` c0)∈ ℂ)
  recnd((Im ` c0), c0 ∈ ℂ)

blocks.name: efieq
blocks.content: The exponentials of two imaginary numbers are equal iff their sine and cosine components are equal. (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 15-Mar-2008.)
blocks.origin:
thm efieq(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wb(wceq(cfv(ce, co(ci, cmul, c0)), cfv(ce, co(ci, cmul, c1))), wa(wceq(cfv(ccos, c0), cfv(ccos, c1)), wceq(cfv(csin, c0), cfv(csin, c1)))))
} = {
  bitrd(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wceq(cfv(ce, co(ci, cmul, c0)), cfv(ce, co(ci, cmul, c1))), wa(wceq(cfv(ccos, c0), cfv(ccos, c1)), wceq(cfv(csin, c0), cfv(csin, c1))), wceq(co(cfv(ccos, c0), caddc, co(ci, cmul, cfv(csin, c0))), co(cfv(ccos, c1), caddc, co(ci, cmul, cfv(csin, c1)))))
  syl2an(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wb(wceq(cfv(ce, co(ci, cmul, c0)), cfv(ce, co(ci, cmul, c1))), wceq(co(cfv(ccos, c0), caddc, co(ci, cmul, cfv(csin, c0))), co(cfv(ccos, c1), caddc, co(ci, cmul, cfv(csin, c1))))), wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc))
  recn(c0)
  recn(c1)
  eqeqan12d(cfv(ce, co(ci, cmul, c0)), cfv(ce, co(ci, cmul, c1)), co(cfv(ccos, c0), caddc, co(ci, cmul, cfv(csin, c0))), co(cfv(ccos, c1), caddc, co(ci, cmul, cfv(csin, c1))), wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc))

} = {
  bitrd((c0 ∈ ℝ ∧ c1 ∈ ℝ), (exp `(i[×]c0))=(exp `(i[×]c1)), ((cos ` c0)=(cos ` c1)∧(sin ` c0)=(sin ` c1)), ((cos ` c0)[+](i[×](sin ` c0)))=((cos ` c1)[+](i[×](sin ` c1))))
  syl2an(c0 ∈ ℝ, c1 ∈ ℝ, ((exp `(i[×]c0))=(exp `(i[×]c1))↔((cos ` c0)[+](i[×](sin ` c0)))=((cos ` c1)[+](i[×](sin ` c1)))), c0 ∈ ℂ, c1 ∈ ℂ)
  recn(c0)

  eqeqan12d((exp `(i[×]c0)), (exp `(i[×]c1)), ((cos ` c0)[+](i[×](sin ` c0))), ((cos ` c1)[+](i[×](sin ` c1))), c0 ∈ ℂ, c1 ∈ ℂ)
  efival(c0)

  syl2an(c0 ∈ ℝ, c1 ∈ ℝ, (((cos ` c0)[+](i[×](sin ` c0)))=((cos ` c1)[+](i[×](sin ` c1)))↔((cos ` c0)=(cos ` c1)∧(sin ` c0)=(sin ` c1))), ((cos ` c0)∈ ℝ ∧(sin ` c0)∈ ℝ), ((cos ` c1)∈ ℝ ∧(sin ` c1)∈ ℝ))
  jca(c0 ∈ ℝ, (cos ` c0)∈ ℝ, (sin ` c0)∈ ℝ)
  recoscl(c0)

blocks.name: tanaddlem
blocks.content: A useful intermediate step in ~ tanadd when showing that the addition of tangents is well-defined. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-Apr-2015.)

thm tanaddlem(class c0, class c1) {

blocks.name: sinmul
blocks.content: Product of sines can be rewritten as half the difference of certain cosines. This follows from ~ cosadd and ~ cossub . (Contributed by David A. Wheeler, 26-May-2015.)

thm sinmul(class c0, class c1) {

blocks.name: cosmul
blocks.content: Product of cosines can be rewritten as half the sum of certain cosines. This follows from ~ cosadd and ~ cossub . (Contributed by David A. Wheeler, 26-May-2015.)

  divcan3(co(cfv(ccos, c0), cmul, cfv(ccos, c1)), nat2)
  oveq1d(co(nat2, cmul, co(cfv(ccos, c0), cmul, cfv(ccos, c1))), cdiv, nat2, co(cfv(ccos, co(c0, cmin, c1)), caddc, cfv(ccos, co(c0, caddc, c1))), wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)))

  ppncand(co(cfv(ccos, c0), cmul, cfv(ccos, c1)), co(cfv(csin, c0), cmul, cfv(csin, c1)), co(cfv(ccos, c0), cmul, cfv(ccos, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)))
  syl2an(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(co(cfv(csin, c0), cmul, cfv(csin, c1)), cc), wcel(cfv(csin, c0), cc), wcel(cfv(csin, c1), cc))

blocks.name: sincossq
blocks.content: Sine squared plus cosine squared is 1. Equation 17 of [Gleason] p. 311. Note that this holds for non-real arguments, even though individually each term is unbounded. (Contributed by NM, 15-Jan-2006.)

thm sincossq(class c0) {

  fveq2d(ccos, co(c0, caddc, cneg(c0)), nat0, wcel(c0, cc))
  negid(c0)
  cos0()
  3eqtrrd(co(co(cfv(ccos, c0), cmul, cfv(ccos, cneg(c0))), cmin, co(cfv(csin, c0), cmul, cfv(csin, cneg(c0)))), co(co(cfv(csin, c0), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(ccos, c0), cexp, nat2)), co(co(cfv(ccos, c0), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(csin, c0), cexp, nat2)), co(co(cfv(ccos, c0), cmul, cfv(ccos, cneg(c0))), caddc, cneg(co(cfv(csin, c0), cmul, cfv(csin, cneg(c0))))), wcel(c0, cc))
  addcomd(co(cfv(csin, c0), cexp, nat2), co(cfv(ccos, c0), cexp, nat2), wcel(c0, cc))

  eqtr4d(co(cfv(ccos, c0), cexp, nat2), co(cfv(ccos, c0), cmul, cfv(ccos, cneg(c0))), co(cfv(ccos, c0), cmul, cfv(ccos, c0)), wcel(c0, cc))
  sqvald(cfv(ccos, c0), wcel(c0, cc))
  oveq2d(cfv(ccos, c0), cmul, cfv(ccos, cneg(c0)), cfv(ccos, c0), wcel(c0, cc))
  cosneg(c0)

thm sincossq(class c0) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ ℂ →(((sin ` c0)[^]2)[+]((cos ` c0)[^]2))= 1)

  3eqtr3rd((((sin ` c0)[^]2)[+]((cos ` c0)[^]2)), nat1, (cos `(c0[+]-u(c0))), (((cos ` c0)[×](cos ` -u(c0)))[-]((sin ` c0)[×](sin ` -u(c0)))), c0 ∈ ℂ)

  cosadd(c0, -u(c0))
  syl6eq((cos `(c0[+]-u(c0))), nat1, (cos ` 0), c0 ∈ ℂ)
  fveq2d(ccos, (c0[+]-u(c0)), nat0, c0 ∈ ℂ)
  negid(c0)
  cos0()
  3eqtrrd((((cos ` c0)[×](cos ` -u(c0)))[-]((sin ` c0)[×](sin ` -u(c0)))), (((sin ` c0)[^]2)[+]((cos ` c0)[^]2)), (((cos ` c0)[^]2)[+]((sin ` c0)[^]2)), (((cos ` c0)[×](cos ` -u(c0)))[+]-u(((sin ` c0)[×](sin ` -u(c0))))), c0 ∈ ℂ)
  addcomd(((sin ` c0)[^]2), ((cos ` c0)[^]2), c0 ∈ ℂ)
  sqcld((sin ` c0), c0 ∈ ℂ)
  sqcld((cos ` c0), c0 ∈ ℂ)
  oveq12d(((cos ` c0)[^]2), caddc, ((sin ` c0)[^]2), ((cos ` c0)[×](cos ` -u(c0))), -u(((sin ` c0)[×](sin ` -u(c0)))), c0 ∈ ℂ)
  eqtr4d(((cos ` c0)[^]2), ((cos ` c0)[×](cos ` -u(c0))), ((cos ` c0)[×](cos ` c0)), c0 ∈ ℂ)
  sqvald((cos ` c0), c0 ∈ ℂ)
  oveq2d((cos ` c0), cmul, (cos ` -u(c0)), (cos ` c0), c0 ∈ ℂ)
  cosneg(c0)
  eqtrd(((sin ` c0)[^]2), -u(((sin ` c0)[×](sin ` -u(c0)))), ((sin ` c0)[×]-u((sin ` -u(c0)))), c0 ∈ ℂ)
  eqtr4d(((sin ` c0)[^]2), ((sin ` c0)[×]-u((sin ` -u(c0)))), ((sin ` c0)[×](sin ` c0)), c0 ∈ ℂ)
  sqvald((sin ` c0), c0 ∈ ℂ)
  oveq2d((sin ` c0), cmul, -u((sin ` -u(c0))), (sin ` c0), c0 ∈ ℂ)
  eqtrd(-u((sin ` -u(c0))), (sin ` c0), -u(-u((sin ` c0))), c0 ∈ ℂ)
  negeqd((sin ` -u(c0)), -u((sin ` c0)), c0 ∈ ℂ)
  sinneg(c0)
  negnegd((sin ` c0), c0 ∈ ℂ)
  mulneg2d((sin ` c0), (sin ` -u(c0)), c0 ∈ ℂ)
  negsubd(((cos ` c0)[×](cos ` -u(c0))), ((sin ` c0)[×](sin ` -u(c0))), c0 ∈ ℂ)
  mulcld((cos ` c0), (cos ` -u(c0)), c0 ∈ ℂ)
  coscl(c0)
  coscld(-u(c0), c0 ∈ ℂ)
  mulcld((sin ` c0), (sin ` -u(c0)), c0 ∈ ℂ)

thm sin2t(class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cc), wceq(cfv(csin, co(nat2, cmul, c0)), co(nat2, cmul, co(cfv(csin, c0), cmul, cfv(ccos, c0)))))

  anidms(wcel(c0, cc), wceq(cfv(csin, co(c0, caddc, c0)), co(co(cfv(csin, c0), cmul, cfv(ccos, c0)), caddc, co(cfv(ccos, c0), cmul, cfv(csin, c0)))))

blocks.name: sinbnd
blocks.content: The sine of a real number lies between -1 and 1. Equation 18 of [Gleason] p. 311. (Contributed by NM, 16-Jan-2006.)
blocks.origin:
thm sinbnd(class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cr), wa(wbr(cneg(nat1), cle, cfv(csin, c0)), wbr(cfv(csin, c0), cle, nat1)))
} = {

  mpbid(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(co(cfv(csin, c0), cexp, nat2), cle, co(co(cfv(csin, c0), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(ccos, c0), cexp, nat2))), wbr(nat0, cle, co(cfv(ccos, c0), cexp, nat2)))
  sqge0d(cfv(ccos, c0), wcel(c0, cr))
  addge01d(co(cfv(ccos, c0), cexp, nat2), co(cfv(csin, c0), cexp, nat2), wcel(c0, cr))
  resqcld(cfv(csin, c0), wcel(c0, cr))
  resqcld(cfv(ccos, c0), wcel(c0, cr))
  recoscl(c0)
  syl6eqr(co(co(cfv(csin, c0), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(ccos, c0), cexp, nat2)), co(nat1, cexp, nat2), nat1, wcel(c0, cr))
  syl(wcel(c0, cr), wceq(co(co(cfv(csin, c0), cexp, nat2), caddc, co(cfv(ccos, c0), cexp, nat2)), nat1), wcel(c0, cc))
  recn(c0)
  sincossq(c0)
  sq1()
  syl(wcel(c0, cr), wb(wbr(co(cfv(csin, c0), cexp, nat2), cle, co(nat1, cexp, nat2)), wa(wbr(cfv(csin, c0), cle, nat1), wbr(cneg(nat1), cle, cfv(csin, c0)))), wcel(cfv(csin, c0), cr))
  resincl(c0)
  bitr3d(wcel(cfv(csin, c0), cr), wbr(co(cfv(csin, c0), cexp, nat2), cle, co(nat1, cexp, nat2)), wa(wbr(cfv(csin, c0), cle, nat1), wbr(cneg(nat1), cle, cfv(csin, c0))), wa(wbr(cfv(csin, c0), cle, nat1), wbr(cneg(cfv(csin, c0)), cle, nat1)))
  mp3an23(wcel(cfv(csin, c0), cr), wb(wa(wbr(cfv(csin, c0), cle, nat1), wbr(cneg(cfv(csin, c0)), cle, nat1)), wbr(co(cfv(csin, c0), cexp, nat2), cle, co(nat1, cexp, nat2))), wcel(nat1, cr), wbr(nat0, cle, nat1))
  0le1()
  lenegsq(cfv(csin, c0), nat1)
  anbi2d(wcel(cfv(csin, c0), cr), wbr(cfv(csin, c0), cle, nat1), wbr(cneg(cfv(csin, c0)), cle, nat1), wbr(cneg(nat1), cle, cfv(csin, c0)))
  mpan2(wcel(cfv(csin, c0), cr), wb(wbr(cneg(cfv(csin, c0)), cle, nat1), wbr(cneg(nat1), cle, cfv(csin, c0))), wcel(nat1, cr))
  1re()
  lenegcon1(cfv(csin, c0), nat1)
}

  eqid(cmpt(s1, cn0, co(co(co(cfv(cabs, co(ci, cmul, c0)), cexp, nat4), cdiv, cfv(cfa, nat4)), cmul, co(co(nat1, cdiv, co(nat4, caddc, nat1)), cexp, cv(s1)))))

  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ ℂ ∧(exp `(i[×]c0))= 1)→ c0 ∈ ℝ)
} = {
  imp(c0 ∈ ℂ, (exp `(i[×]c0))= 1, c0 ∈ ℝ)
  sylibd(c0 ∈ ℂ, (exp `(i[×]c0))= 1, c0 ∈ ℝ, (exp ` -u((Im ` c0)))=(abs ` 1))
  sylbid(c0 ∈ ℂ, (exp `(i[×]c0))= 1, (exp ` -u((Im ` c0)))=(abs ` 1), ((exp `(i[×](Re ` c0)))[×](exp ` -u((Im ` c0))))= 1)
  eqeq1d((exp `(i[×]c0)), nat1, ((exp `(i[×](Re ` c0)))[×](exp ` -u((Im ` c0)))), c0 ∈ ℂ)
  eqtrd((exp `(i[×]c0)), ((exp `(i[×](Re ` c0)))[×](exp ` -u((Im ` c0)))), (exp `((i[×](Re ` c0))[+]-u((Im ` c0)))), c0 ∈ ℂ)
  fveq2d(ce, (i[×]c0), ((i[×](Re ` c0))[+]-u((Im ` c0))), c0 ∈ ℂ)
  eqtrd((i[×]c0), ((i[×](Re ` c0))[+]-u((Im ` c0))), (i[×]((Re ` c0)[+](i[×](Im ` c0)))), c0 ∈ ℂ)
  oveq2d(ci, cmul, c0, ((Re ` c0)[+](i[×](Im ` c0))), c0 ∈ ℂ)
  replim(c0)
  eqtrd((i[×]((Re ` c0)[+](i[×](Im ` c0)))), ((i[×](Re ` c0))[+]-u((Im ` c0))), ((i[×](Re ` c0))[+](i[×](i[×](Im ` c0)))), c0 ∈ ℂ)
  mp3an2i(c0 ∈ ℂ, (i[×]((Re ` c0)[+](i[×](Im ` c0))))=((i[×](Re ` c0))[+](i[×](i[×](Im ` c0)))), i ∈ ℂ, (Re ` c0)∈ ℂ, (i[×](Im ` c0))∈ ℂ)
  sylancr(c0 ∈ ℂ, (i[×](Im ` c0))∈ ℂ, i ∈ ℂ, (Im ` c0)∈ ℂ)
  mulcl(ci, (Im ` c0))
  adddi(ci, (Re ` c0), (i[×](Im ` c0)))
  oveq2d((i[×](Re ` c0)), caddc, (i[×](i[×](Im ` c0))), -u((Im ` c0)), c0 ∈ ℂ)
  3eqtr3a((i[×](i[×](Im ` c0))), -u((Im ` c0)), ((i[×]i)[×](Im ` c0)), (-u(1)[×](Im ` c0)), c0 ∈ ℂ)
  oveq1i((i[×]i), cmul, (Im ` c0), -u(1))
  ixi()
  mp3an12i(c0 ∈ ℂ, ((i[×]i)[×](Im ` c0))=(i[×](i[×](Im ` c0))), i ∈ ℂ, i ∈ ℂ, (Im ` c0)∈ ℂ)
  mulass(ci, ci, (Im ` c0))
  mulm1d((Im ` c0), c0 ∈ ℂ)
  syl2anc(c0 ∈ ℂ, (exp `((i[×](Re ` c0))[+]-u((Im ` c0))))=((exp `(i[×](Re ` c0)))[×](exp ` -u((Im ` c0)))), (i[×](Re ` c0))∈ ℂ, -u((Im ` c0))∈ ℂ)
  efadd((i[×](Re ` c0)), -u((Im ` c0)))
  ex(c0 ∈ ℂ, ((exp `(i[×](Re ` c0)))[×](exp ` -u((Im ` c0))))= 1, (exp ` -u((Im ` c0)))=(abs ` 1))
  sylan9eq((exp ` -u((Im ` c0))), (abs ` 1), (abs `((exp `(i[×](Re ` c0)))[×](exp ` -u((Im ` c0))))), c0 ∈ ℂ, ((exp `(i[×](Re ` c0)))[×](exp ` -u((Im ` c0))))= 1)
  3eqtrrd((exp ` -u((Im ` c0))), (abs `((exp `(i[×](Re ` c0)))[×](exp ` -u((Im ` c0))))), ((abs `(exp `(i[×](Re ` c0))))[×](abs `(exp ` -u((Im ` c0))))), (1[×](exp ` -u((Im ` c0)))), c0 ∈ ℂ)
  absmuld((exp `(i[×](Re ` c0))), (exp ` -u((Im ` c0))), c0 ∈ ℂ)
  syl(c0 ∈ ℂ, (exp `(i[×](Re ` c0)))∈ ℂ, (i[×](Re ` c0))∈ ℂ)

  recnd(-u((Im ` c0)), c0 ∈ ℂ)
  efcl(-u((Im ` c0)))
  fveq2(((exp `(i[×](Re ` c0)))[×](exp ` -u((Im ` c0)))), nat1, cabs)
  3bitr4rd(c0 ∈ ℂ, (exp ` -u((Im ` c0)))=(abs ` 1), c0 ∈ ℝ, (Im ` c0)= 0, -u((Im ` c0))= 0)
  negeq0d((Im ` c0), c0 ∈ ℂ)
  recnd((Im ` c0), c0 ∈ ℂ)

blocks.name: demoivre
blocks.content: De Moivre's Formula. Proof by induction given at ~ http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/De_Moivre's_formula , but restricted to nonnegative integer powers. See also ~ demoivreALT for an alternate longer proof not using the exponential function. (Contributed by NM, 24-Jul-2007.)
blocks.origin:
thm demoivre(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cz)), wceq(co(co(cfv(ccos, c0), caddc, co(ci, cmul, cfv(csin, c0))), cexp, c1), co(cfv(ccos, co(c1, cmul, c0)), caddc, co(ci, cmul, cfv(csin, co(c1, cmul, c0))))))
} = {
  3eqtr3rd(co(co(cfv(ccos, c0), caddc, co(ci, cmul, cfv(csin, c0))), cexp, c1), co(cfv(ccos, co(c1, cmul, c0)), caddc, co(ci, cmul, cfv(csin, co(c1, cmul, c0)))), cfv(ce, co(c1, cmul, co(ci, cmul, c0))), co(cfv(ce, co(ci, cmul, c0)), cexp, c1), wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cz)))
  sylan(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cz), wceq(cfv(ce, co(c1, cmul, co(ci, cmul, c0))), co(cfv(ce, co(ci, cmul, c0)), cexp, c1)), wcel(co(ci, cmul, c0), cc))
  mpan(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(co(ci, cmul, c0), cc), wcel(ci, cc))
  mulcl(ci, c0)
  efexp(co(ci, cmul, c0), c1)
  sylan2(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cz), wceq(cfv(ce, co(c1, cmul, co(ci, cmul, c0))), co(cfv(ccos, co(c1, cmul, c0)), caddc, co(ci, cmul, cfv(csin, co(c1, cmul, c0))))), wcel(c1, cc))
  zcn(c1)
  ancoms(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wceq(cfv(ce, co(c1, cmul, co(ci, cmul, c0))), co(cfv(ccos, co(c1, cmul, c0)), caddc, co(ci, cmul, cfv(csin, co(c1, cmul, c0))))))
  eqtrd(cfv(ce, co(c1, cmul, co(ci, cmul, c0))), co(cfv(ccos, co(c1, cmul, c0)), caddc, co(ci, cmul, cfv(csin, co(c1, cmul, c0)))), cfv(ce, co(ci, cmul, co(c1, cmul, c0))), wa(wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c0, cc)))
  fveq2d(ce, co(c1, cmul, co(ci, cmul, c0)), co(ci, cmul, co(c1, cmul, c0)), wa(wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c0, cc)))
  mp3an2(wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c0, cc), wceq(co(c1, cmul, co(ci, cmul, c0)), co(ci, cmul, co(c1, cmul, c0))), wcel(ci, cc))
  ax-icn()
  mul12(c1, ci, c0)
  syl(wa(wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c0, cc)), wceq(cfv(ce, co(ci, cmul, co(c1, cmul, c0))), co(cfv(ccos, co(c1, cmul, c0)), caddc, co(ci, cmul, cfv(csin, co(c1, cmul, c0))))), wcel(co(c1, cmul, c0), cc))
  mulcl(c1, c0)
  efival(co(c1, cmul, c0))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cz), wceq(co(cfv(ce, co(ci, cmul, c0)), cexp, c1), co(co(cfv(ccos, c0), caddc, co(ci, cmul, cfv(csin, c0))), cexp, c1)))
  oveq1d(cfv(ce, co(ci, cmul, c0)), cexp, c1, co(cfv(ccos, c0), caddc, co(ci, cmul, cfv(csin, c0))), wcel(c0, cc))
  efival(c0)
}

blocks.name: demoivreALT
blocks.content: Alternate proof of ~ demoivre . It is longer but does not use the exponential function. This is Metamath 100 proof #17. (Contributed by Steve Rodriguez, 10-Nov-2006.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm demoivreALT(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cn0)), wceq(co(co(cfv(ccos, c0), caddc, co(ci, cmul, cfv(csin, c0))), cexp, c1), co(cfv(ccos, co(c1, cmul, c0)), caddc, co(ci, cmul, cfv(csin, co(c1, cmul, c0))))))
